name: How to Change a Tire
description: A step-by-step guide to changing a flat tire.

step.name: Loosen the lug nuts
step.text: Use the lug wrench to loosen the lug nuts on the flat tire.

step.name: Jack up the car
step.text: Place the jack under the car frame and raise the car.

step.name: Remove the flat tire
step.text: Remove the lug nuts and pull off the flat tire.
